 2008-02482008-02-07,  ,  PSEP,  , 
ActEmergency Management Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 99 - which authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the Province of NOVA SCOTIA in respect of damage caused by a severe storm Noel that affected the Province of Nova Scotia (Halifax and Lunenburg having been particularly affected) on November 3 and 4, 2007.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
